Events

                    
                    Take part.                 
            
        
    
    

We will run a weekly seminar in Cambridge lasting for two academic years. This seminar is open to all members of the University of Cambridge. Those from outside the University interested in attending the seminar should contact the Project Leader, Professor Tim Crane.

Two workshops will be held in Cambridge, one in 2016 and one in 2017. There will be a call for papers for each workshop.

A series of public lectures will be held in London jointly with the University of London’s Institute of Philosophy.

In the summer of 2017 a major international conference will be held in Cambridge.

Watch this page for further details, or join us on twitter.
